      Methods in net.beaconcontroller.devicemanager that return types with arguments of type Device 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Device> IDeviceManager.getDevices()
      Returns a list of all known devices in the system
      Methods in net.beaconcontroller.devicemanager with parameters of type Device 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IDeviceManagerAware.deviceAdded(Device device)
      Called when a new Device is found
      void IDeviceManagerAware.deviceMoved(Device device, IOFSwitch oldSw, Short oldPort, IOFSwitch sw, Short port)
      Called when a Device has moved to a new location on the network.
      void IDeviceManagerAware.deviceNetworkAddressAdded(Device device, Set<Integer> networkAddresses, Integer networkAddress)
      Called when a network address is added to a Device.
      void IDeviceManagerAware.deviceNetworkAddressRemoved(Device device, Set<Integer> networkAddresses, Integer networkAddress)
      Called when a network address is removed from a Device.
      void IDeviceManagerAware.deviceRemoved(Device device)
      Called when a Device is removed, this typically occurs when the port the Device is attached to goes down, or the switch it is attached to is removed.
